txt.en: You have been tasked with collecting gears and redirecting the flow of water within the dwarf-made waterways of Shalakâm.
The mission is complete!\n\nSpeak to Hórin for your reward!

'I have a new mission for you, [placeholder].

'Our workers have returned from old dwarf-made waterways of Shalakâm. Even with their efforts, the waters still do not flow in the directions needed to bring additional fresh water to Máttugard.

'You are to travel to Shalakâm, and work to assist in redirecting the flow of the water there. While you are patrolling the waterways, would you collect any misplaced parts that the workers may have left behind?'
Complete Mission: The Flow of Water

'Within Shalakâm, the ancient waterways of Gundabad, many old gates direct the flow of water….\n\n'Your mission is to collect gears and redirect the flow water within the dwarf-made waterways of Shalakâm.'
You must find a way to breach a barrier to reach your mission objective.
Your mission is to collect gears and redirect the flow water within the dwarf-made waterways of Shalakâm.\n\nSpeak to Hórin to travel.

'Excellent work, [placeholder]!\n\n'I am sure that everyone in Máttugard will thank you for your efforts. I also thank you for returning with all these gears. I am sure we will be able to put them to good use in our continued restoration efforts of Gundabad.'
